content.text:
# Government Engineering College, Banswara

Government Engineering College, Banswara is a government autonomous engineering college in Banswara, Rajasthan, India. It was established in 2012 and offers courses in different engineering branches.
It is located on the Dugarpur road behind the Mayur Mill. The
Government Engineering College, Banswara offered engineering in three branches: Mechanical, electrical and civil. The first batch was successfully passed out in 2016. It was spread over a 50-acre campus.
